tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name TEXT, project_group TEXT)
CREATE TABLE ProjectGroups (group_id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE TaskGroups (task_id INT, group_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(task_id), FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES ProjectGroups(group_id))

CREATE TABLE user_tasks(
    user_task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);
